scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m "chore: init" && git push origin
scripts.resetDB_d: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.resetDB_t: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env test
